description.plain:
Crossing over the sounds of bedroom pop and indie pop, all anchored by his signature ukulele-driven melodies, BoyWithUke exploded in popularity through a series of Tik Tok videos featuring minute-long songs he played on ukulele and produced on his iPad, amassing millions of views on the platform.

He made his streaming debut in 2021, the viral success of his minute-long songs translating into streaming numbers as his album, Fever Dreams, became one of the top ten album debuts during its debut weekend on Spotify UK.

His profile rose with the release of his hit single “Toxic”, which amassed over a hundred million streams in the first few months of released and, to-date, has peaked at #65 on Billboard’s Global 200 chart. The song was also certified Platinum by the RIAA for sales of a million units.

Following the breakout success of “Toxic” and his signing to Republic Records, BoyWithUke announced his debut studio album, Serotonin Dreams, preceded by the singles “Long Drives” and “IDGAF”, a collaboration with American singer/rapper blackbear that became his first charting song on the Billboard Hot 100. Serotonin Dreams ultimately ended up debuting at #72 on the Billboard 200.

Following the release of his debut, “IDGAF” became his second song to achieve Gold status for sales of half a million units in the US.

He made his streaming debut in 2021, the viral success of his minute-long songs translating into streaming numbers as his album, Fever Dreams, became one of the top ten album debuts during its debut weekend on Spotify UK.

His profile rose with the release of his hit single “Toxic”, which amassed over a hundred million streams in the first few months of released and, to-date, has peaked at #65 on Billboard’s Global 200 chart. The song was also certified Platinum by the RIAA for sales of a million units.

Following the breakout success of “Toxic” and his signing to Republic Records, BoyWithUke announced his debut studio album, Serotonin Dreams, preceded by the singles “Long Drives” and “IDGAF”, a collaboration with American singer/rapper blackbear that became his first charting song on the Billboard Hot 100. Serotonin Dreams ultimately ended up debuting at #72 on the Billboard 200.

Following the release of his debut, “IDGAF” became his second song to achieve Gold status for sales of half a million units in the US.

songs.title: Toxic

description.plain: Toxic is a standalone single from BoyWithUke. It’s his most successful song to date, with over 200 million streams. BWU has performed the song live at Genius in the “Open Mic” series.

songs.lyrics:
68 ContributorsTwo Moons Lyrics[Verse 1]
Two moons, I can feel myself start catching on fire
You knew, yeah, you kept it to yourself, to yourself
Two moons, I get lost on my way searching for liars
This ain't good for my health, no, this ain't good for my health

[Chorus]
Sorry, please excuse me for my mess
My heart's been pouring through my chest
I fell through corridors of broken floors
I'm sorry that I left
Fell asleep in my new bed
I can't feel happy in my head
I see two moons and nothing more
I close my door, I'm left with less
[Post-Chorus]
Ooooh, Oooooh
(Ooooh, Ooooh)

[Verse 2]
I don't feel serene (No)
No, I don't feel too clean (Oh)
And I don't want to be the one to make you cry
I'll play inside, I'll start a fire
I'll tell your friends that I lost my mind
It'll take a while, but I'll start to smile
Broken windows and broken tiles
Frozen willows will go for miles
Hope will let go, yeah, that's it's style
And you don't know where my soul's heading
I'm forgetting you, so I'll say

[Chorus]
Sorry, please excuse me for my mess
My heart's been pouring through my chest
I fell through corridors of broken floors
I'm sorry that I left
Fell asleep in my new bed
I can't feel happy in my head
I see two moons and nothing more
I close my door, I'm left with less
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
Ooooh, Oooooh
(Ooooh, Ooooh)

[Verse 3]
Left, right, my eyesight is diminishing
My life sucks, at night I tried to finish it early
Pearly whites get blurry
Surely I'll go bite the dirty dust
Cuts deeper as my head goes nuts
I'll be a believer if I ever see trust
I must be disgusting rust
God, I hate myself, I just wanna unplug
Yeah, fuck no, I go where I want to

I'm telling lies to keep myself from hurting those around you
Yeah, after all these years, I found you (I found you, again)

[Chorus]

songs.title: IDGAF

description.plain:
The third single off of BoyWithUke’s debut studio album, Serotonin Dreams, “IDGAF” is a deeply personal alt-pop song that sees the masked singer address an ex-lover with whom he has fallen out with.

The track also features American singer/rapper blackbear, making this song BoyWithUke’s first to have a featured artist. The song also notably features production from Andrew Goldstein, a frequent blackbear collaborator who has written and produced for a number of high-profile artists including 5 Seconds of Summer.

The song was an instant hit, reaching Spotify charts across the world, as well as debuting and peaking at #99 on the Billboard Hot 100, making the song BoyWithUke’s first single to chart on the Hot 100.

songs.embed_content: Read “IDGAF” by BoyWithUke on Genius

songs.lyrics:
35 ContributorsTranslationsРусскийTürkçeIDGAF Lyrics[Verse 1: BoyWithUke]
You were caught in a lie, said it with your eyes
Said to all my homies that you weren't even mine
You didn't think twice, got a heart made of ice
And that shit hit me, did me dirty
I never asked why, and I never did cry
I never told another how I felt inside
My demons don't hide when I'm dreaming at night
And I won't mislead you, you'll miss me

[Chorus: BoyWithUke & blackbear]
'Cause I don't give a fuck about you no more
Give me back my hoodies or I'm kickin' down doors
You weren't even pretty, lookin' back and I'm sure
You still miss me, that's so funny
I don't give a fuck about you, you swore
You would never talk about me before
You lied lookin' filthy in your ugly jean shorts
You still kissed me, now shit's history (Yeah)
[Verse 2: blackbear]
I don't mind if we speak again
I don't wanna be cool, I don't wanna be friends
Leave me half alive, on my homies, you was flirty
Filled me up with lies, and you did me so dirty
'Cause I don't give a fuck about you no more
Left me bleedin' with my heart on the floor
You were never really mine, I was never really yours
You're the demon on my shoulder I'm just tryin' to ignore
And I don't give a shit about your fake-ass friends
Hollywood Hills, while we play pretend
I don't wanna say, "I'm sorry," I don't wanna make amends
I will never make a mistake like you again

[Chorus: blackbear]
'Cause I don't give a fuck about you no more
Give me back my hoodies or I'm kickin' down doors
You weren't even pretty, lookin' back and I'm sure
You still miss me, that's so funny
I don't give a fuck about you, you swore
You would never talk about me before
You lied lookin' filthy in your ugly jean shorts
You still kissed me, now shit's history

[Verse 3: BoyWithUke]
Regardless, you're so heartless
Lead my heart into your darkness
Hid the truth behind your harmless pretty face (Aww)
And I know you're runnin' out of other options
Live in your head rent free, a neurotoxin
And I wake up every morning with a smile in my face
Knowin' full well you were put up for adoption (Oh)
Oh shit, yeah, I went there but honestly, I don't care
You never tried to play fair with me
Left me broken with scars, makin' all these remarks
So now this is the part where I leave
You might also like[Chorus: BoyWithUke & blackbear, blackbear]
'Cause I don't give a fuck about you no more (No more)
Give me back my hoodies or I'm kickin' down doors (Down doors)
You weren't even pretty, lookin' back and I'm sure
You still miss me, that's so funny
I don't give a fuck about you, you swore (You swore)
You would never talk about me before (Before)
You lied lookin' filthy in your ugly jean shorts
You still kissed me, now shit's history5Embed
